alert.note: Alert for Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 28 at 10:09AM CST until December 30 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Wild Rice River (ND) near Abercrombie affecting Richland County. For the Wild Rice River (ND)...including Abercrombie...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wild Rice River (ND) near Abercrombie. * WHEN...From Friday morning to Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 18.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is at 17.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday afternoon at 415 PM CST.
